item.title: KIKA add a quote by Deanna Raybourn
item.description: "To say that I met Nicholas Brisbane over my husband's dead body is not entirely accurate. Edward, it should be noted, was still twitching upon the floor." -- Deanna Raybourn

item.title: KIKA add a quote by Miss Piggy
item.description: "Beauty is in the eye of the beholder and it may be necessary from time to time to give a stupid or misinformed beholder a black eye." -- Miss Piggy

item.title: KIKA add a quote by Rodney Dangerfield
item.description: "What a kid I got, I told him about the birds and the bees and he told me about the butcher and my wife." -- Rodney Dangerfield

item.title: KIKA add a quote by Richard Peck
item.description: "I read.. because one life is not enough" -- Richard Peck

item.title: KIKA add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: KIKA add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "Is that a bulletproof vest? See, now that's so insulting. That's like saying I'm not smart enough to shoot you in the head." Eddie DeChooch" -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: KIKA add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Be careful about reading health books. You may die of a misprint." -- Mark Twain

item.title: KIKA add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: KIKA add a quote by Kersten Hamilton
item.description: "When I meet someone who says they're not "much for books," I can guarantee that they haven't met the right book yet." -- Kersten Hamilton

item.title: KIKA add a quote by Kersten Hamilton
item.description: "It's an Irish story, love, Mrs. Wylltson said. We don't do happy endings." -- Kersten Hamilton

item.title: KIKA add a quote by Melina Marchetta
item.description: "It's funny how you can forget everything except people loving you. Maybe that's why humans find it so hard getting over love affairs. It's not the pain they're getting over, it's the love." -- Melina Marchetta

item.title: KIKA add a quote by Melina Marchetta
item.description: "What do you want from me?" he asks. What I want from every person in my life, I want to tell him. More." -- Melina Marchetta

item.title: KIKA add a quote by Melina Marchetta
item.description: "Hold my hand because I might disappear." -- Melina Marchetta

item.title: KIKA add a quote by Melina Marchetta
item.description:
"My father took one hundred and thirty-two minutes to die.
I counted.
It happened on the Jellicoe Road. The prettiest road I’d ever seen, where trees made breezy canopies like a tunnel to Shangri-La. We were going to the ocean, hundreds of miles away, because I wanted to see the ocean and my father said that it was about time the four of us made that journey. I remember asking, 'What’s the difference between a trip and a journey?' and my father said, 'Narnie, my love, when we get there, you’ll understand,' and that was the last thing he ever said." -- Melina Marchetta

item.title: KIKA add a quote by Melina Marchetta
item.description: "Because being part of him isn't just anything. It's kind of everything." -- Melina Marchetta

item.title: KIKA add a quote by Melina Marchetta
item.description: "<i>Never</i>,' he tells me in a tone full of ice, 'underestimate who or what I care for." -- Melina Marchetta

item.title: KIKA add a quote by Melina Marchetta
item.description: "When it was over, she gathered him in her arms. And told him the terrible irony of her life. That she had wanted to be dead all those years while her brother had been alive. That had been her sin. And this was her penance. Wanting to live when everyone else seemed dead." -- Melina Marchetta

item.title: KIKA add a quote by Melina Marchetta
item.description: "I don't want to let go, because tonight I'm not looking for anything more than being part of him. Because being part of him isn't just anything. It's kind of everything." -- Melina Marchetta

item.title: KIKA add a quote by Melina Marchetta
item.description: "Girls under the age of fourteen are the most frightening creatures I have ever come across. - Jonah Griggs" -- Melina Marchetta

item.title: KIKA add a quote by Melina Marchetta
item.description: "And life goes on, which seems kind of strange and cruel when you're watching someone die." -- Melina Marchetta

item.title: KIKA add a quote by Megan Whalen Turner
KIKA add a quote by Megan Whalen Turner
item.description: "It isn't deep," the Eddisian Ambassador said from the other side of the bed. He was leaning over the wound, looking critical and mildly disappointed. Eugenides didn't miss a beat. "It is...too...deep!" he insisted, outraged." -- Megan Whalen Turner
